comments:
Problem occurs both with existing and new workspace.

File->Import->External Plug-ins and Fragments
Next, Next

Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Reason:
org/apache/xerces/impl/xpath/regex/Token (Illegal UTF8 string in constant pool)

If you then continue by clicking next again, the plugins are imported but are 
not configured correctly

The imported binary plugins all have a .classpath file that only contains:
   <classpathentry kind="output" path="bin"/>

I tried it both on an existing and a new workspace, and I was able to import 
without any problems.

I could not reproduce on my home machine, but we have reproduced on both a 
windows and linux box here with both new and old workspaces.
I even re-downloaded the build to ensure we did not get a bad JAR or something 
like that.
Any ideas?

The exception seems to be way deep into xerces code.
Is it possible that you have another version of xerces on your machine that may 
be getting picked up instead of the one packaged in Eclipse?

If I launch eclipse on an IBM 1.3.1 vm the problem disappears.
I normally work on 1.4.2beta-b05.

traces.message: org/apache/xerces/impl/xpath/regex/Token (Illegal  UTF8 string in constant pool)
